attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why with so few police, but plenty of highway vosa 4x4 patrols driving around waiting to place yet more road cones out and smile at us. why cant highway patrols pull over middle laners and try to inforce the correct way to drive. This will free the road lanes better, thus less congestion like on european roads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
